thread.title: Sathyan Anthikad amazed by Mammootty’s acting
thread.title_full: Sathyan Anthikad amazed by Mammootty’s acting - The Times of India

author: Deepika Jayaram
title: Sathyan Anthikad amazed by Mammootty’s acting
text:
The film Pathemari has struck a chord with the Malayali audience for its depiction of the Indian diaspora from the Gulf .
Looks like the Mammootty starrer has impressed director Sathyan Anthikad as well.
Sathyan commented on a social networking platform that he felt proud as well as elated, watching the film. The loud cheers, once the film came to a close, was a proof of the fact that qualitative films will get the recognition it deserves, according to the director.
The Ennum Eppozhum director said that he felt a lump inside after watching Mammootty's effortless acting in the film.
